程序包 dao.mappers

类 RecipeIngredient

java.lang.Object
dao.mappers.RecipeIngredient
public class RecipeIngredient extends Object
Represents an ingredient used in a recipe, containing details such as recipe ID, ingredient name, quantity, unit of measurement, and description.
作者:
He Chenyi

  • 构造器概要

    Copy constructor for RecipeIngredient objects.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RecipeIngredient

      public RecipeIngredient()
      Default constructor for the RecipeIngredient class.

    • RecipeIngredient

      public RecipeIngredient(int recipeId, String name, Float quantity, String unit, String description)
      Constructs a RecipeIngredient object with specified attributes.
      参数:
      recipeId - The unique identifier of the recipe this ingredient belongs to.
      name - The name of the ingredient.
      quantity - The quantity or amount of the ingredient.
      unit - The unit of measurement for the quantity (e.g., grams, milliliters).
      description - A brief description or additional notes about the ingredient.

    • RecipeIngredient

      public RecipeIngredient(RecipeIngredient ingredient)
      Copy constructor for RecipeIngredient objects. Creates a new RecipeIngredient object based on an existing one.
      参数:
      ingredient - The RecipeIngredient object to copy.
